description:
11.173 negate
Negate (invert) the input video.

It accepts the following option:
name: negate

parameters.description:
Set components to negate.

Available values for components are:

‘y’
‘u’
‘v’
‘a’
‘r’
‘g’
‘b’
parameters.name: components

parameters.description: With value 1, it negates the alpha component, if present. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: negate_alpha

source:
11.173 negate

Negate (invert) the input video.

It accepts the following option:

components

Set components to negate.

Available values for components are:

‘y’
‘u’
‘v’
‘a’
‘r’
‘g’
‘b’
negate_alpha

With value 1, it negates the alpha component, if present. Default value is 0.
